# <code>sleep</code> for platform

<div class='command-title'>Delay for a specified amount of time.</div>

## Signature

```> sleep <duration> ...(rest)```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```duration <Duration>```: time to sleep
 * ```...rest <Duration>```: additional time
## Examples

  Sleep for 1sec
```shell
  > sleep 1sec
```
  Sleep for 3sec
```shell
  > sleep 1sec 1sec 1sec
```
  Send output after 1sec
```shell
  > sleep 1sec; echo done
```
